description: Today, the FBI, CISA, and the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) warned U.S. healthcare organizations of targeted ALPHV/Blackcat ransomware attacks. [...]
title: FBI, CISA warn US hospitals of targeted BlackCat ransomware attacks

description: The Phishing as a Service (PhaaS) platform 'LabHost' has been helping cybercriminals target North American banks, particularly financial institutes in Canada, causing a notable increase in activity. [...]
title: LabHost cybercrime service lets anyone phish Canadian bank users

description: The Black Basta and Bl00dy ransomware gangs have joined widespread attacks targeting ScreenConnect servers unpatched against a maximum severity authentication bypass vulnerability. [...]
title: Black Basta, Bl00dy ransomware gangs join ScreenConnect attacks

description: Russian APT28 military hackers are using compromised Ubiquiti EdgeRouters to evade detection, the FBI says in a joint advisory issued with the NSA, the U.S. Cyber Command, and international partners. [...]
title: Russian hackers hijack Ubiquiti routers to launch stealthy attacks

description: The German state of Hessen (Hesse) has been hit with a ransomware attack, causing the government to shut down IT systems and disrupting the availability of its consumer advice center. [...]
title: German state of Hessen says systems encrypted by ransomware

description: The Hessen Consumer Center in Germany has been hit with a ransomware attack, causing IT systems to shut down and temporarily disrupting its availability. [...]
title: Hessen Consumer Center says systems encrypted by ransomware

description: Malicious JavaScript code hidden in a Tornado Cash governance proposal has been leaking deposit notes and data to a private server for almost two months. [...]
title: Malicious code in Tornado Cash governance proposal puts user funds at risk

description: Microsoft says the February 2024 updates fail to install on Windows 11 22H2 and 23H2 systems, with 0x800F0922 errors and downloads stopping at 96%. [...]
title: Windows February 2024 updates fail to install with 0x800F0922 errors

description: A cyberattack on UnitedHealth Group subsidiary Optum that led to an ongoing outage impacting the Change Healthcare payment exchange platform was linked to the BlackCat ransomware group by sources familiar with the investigation. [...]
title: UnitedHealth subsidiary Optum hack linked to BlackCat ransomware
